products.name: Vacuum Cleaner
products.description: A modern vacuum cleaner that uses suction to remove dirty from surfaces such as floors, seats, drapes etc.

products.name: Phone
products.description: A fully functional Android phone featuring the latest Android version, 32MP front camera, 64MP rear camera, 8GB RAM and 128GB ROM.

products.name: Couch
products.description: A comfortable couch with exquisite upholstery, fibre fillings and warm color.

products.name: Hiking bag
products.description: A 128L capacity bag with provisions for holding a water bottle, tough material meant to withstand harsh hiking conditions and a padded layer rendering it comfortable for the back.

products.name: Water bottle
products.description: A 1L capacity bottle made of durable material and an exterior with an appealing colour.

products.name: TV
products.description: A 55 inch QLED TV offering high resolution images, adaptive sound feature and has Android features in-built.

products.name: Lawn mower
products.description: A modern lawn mower with a mechanical cutter, runs on diesel and has the automated option making it capable of running unmanned.

products.name: Mug
products.description: A high quality 750ml mug with a beautiful and patriotic tribute to Kenya.
